verses.verse: That which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> as the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> conquered <S%H5221><s%> Gaza. <S%H5804><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> are going to rise <S%H5927><s%> from the north <S%H6828><s%> And become <S%H1961><s%> an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> torrent, <S%H5158><s%> And overflow <S%H7857><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H4393><s%> its fulness, <S%H4393><s%> The city <S%H5892><s%> and those who live <S%H3427><s%> in it; And the men <S%H120><s%> will cry <S%H2199><s%> out, And every <S%H3605><s%> inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> will wail. <S%H3213><s%>

"Because <S%H4480><s%> of the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the galloping <S%H8161><s%> hoofs <S%H6541><s%> of his stallions, <S%H47><s%> The tumult <S%H7494><s%> of his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> [and] the rumbling <S%H1995><s%> of his wheels, <S%H1534><s%> The fathers have not turned <S%H1><s%> back <S%H6437><s%> for [their] children, <S%H6437><s%> Because <S%H1121><s%> of the limpness <S%H4480><s%> of [their] hands, <S%H7510><s%>

On account <S%H5921><s%> of the day <S%H3117><s%> that is coming <S%H935><s%> To destroy <S%H7703><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> To cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> from Tyre <S%H6865><s%> and Sidon <S%H6721><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> ally <S%H5826><s%> that is left; <S%H8300><s%> For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is going to destroy <S%H7703><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the coastland <S%H339><s%> of Caphtor. <S%H3731><s%>

"Baldness <S%H7144><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> upon Gaza; <S%H5804><s%> Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> has been ruined. <S%H1820><s%> O remnant <S%H7611><s%> of their valley, <S%H6010><s%> How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> will you gash <S%H1413><s%> yourself?

"Ah, sword <S%H2719><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> How <S%H575><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> will you not be quiet <S%H8252><s%>? Withdraw <S%H622><s%> into your sheath; <S%H8593><s%> Be at rest <S%H7280><s%> and stay <S%H1826><s%> still. <S%H1826><s%>

"How <S%H349><s%> can it be quiet, <S%H8252><s%> When the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H6680><s%> it an order <S%H6680><s%>? Against <S%H413><s%> Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> and against <S%H413><s%> the seacoast <S%H3220><s%> <S%H2348><s%> â€“ There <S%H8033><s%> He has assigned <S%H3259><s%> it."
